Im post dey come less dan twenty-four hours afta di actress tok say both of dem don settle afta 10 years of bitter public battles.

For one lengthy post she share on her official Instagram page on Saturday, 24 January, di actress tok say peace don return to dia relationship afta nearly a decade of kasala, bitterness and broken communication.

Madam Dike tok say di reconciliation no be by human effort but na God make am possible and di sincere prayer of her pikin wey she born for Oga Churchill.

For im reaction to di post, Oga Churchill  say e get how faith take dey bring clarity, humility and peace and add say im acknowledge di growth and grace for di manner in which di mata take settle.

"Wit God leading, healing and understanding don bicom possible. Forgiveness don pave di way for a new chapter and we dey move forward wit a sense of peace and mutual respect."

End of Di one wey oda users dey read well well

E also thank di actress wey for long don deny am access to dia son for bin an "amazing mother to im  son and for doing a good job."

Popular Nigerian actress and politician Tonto Dike don announce reconciliation wit her ex-husband Olakunle Churchill afta several years of bitter separation.

For one post she share on her official Instagram page, di actress tok say peace don return to dia relationship afta nearly a decade of kasala, bitterness and broken communication.

"Afta ten long years of public battles, deep wounds, broken communication, bitterness, and pain, God step in. Peace don replace chaos and respect don return di place wia anger bin first live" she write for di post.

Madam Dike add say di reconciliation no be by human effort but na God make am possible and di sincere prayer of her pikin wey she born for Oga Churchill.

"Evri plan of darkness don fail. Stubbornness don bow. Pride don melt. Love don find im voice again for my child," she add.

Dis article contain content wey Instagram provide. We ask for una permission before anytin dey loaded, as dem fit dey use cookies and oda technologies. You fit wan read di Instagramcookie policyandprivacy policybefore accepting. To view dis content choose 'accept and continue'.

Di reconciliation dey come afta Tonto Dikeh renewed devotion to Christ.

For di post, Ms Dikeh thank Oga Churchill for choosing peace, she say, "I dey deeply grateful to di father of my child Dr Kunle for yielding to God's word and choosing peace. Obedience to God always birth restoration, even wen di road bin dey long and painful."

She also encourage pipo wey dey face facing similar challenges, say make dem no lose hope, as patience, prayer and faith fit resolve difficult situations.

Oga Churchill neva react to di reconciliation.

Actress Tonto Dikeh and Olakunle Churchill bin marry for 2015 for one high-profile ceremony, but dia union bin no last.

Dia break up bin dey messy and e shake internet at di time sake of claims of abuse, betrayal and violence from Tonto Dike, allegations wey Churchill deny.

Di child wey dem get togeda, King Andre Churchill, bin dey di middle of di prolonged back and forth sake of di issue of custody and welfare.

For one 2019 interview, di ex-husband wey be popular philanthropist for Nigeria, bin tok how dem meet and how di marriage take scata.

"I meet Tonto for my brother birthday party back in 2014, and she get belle three months afta we meet. Wen I met Tonto, I already be one of di most successful young millionaires for Africa," e tok.

E say plenty tins scata di marriage wey range from "several frivolous claims of falsity, domestic violence to false allegations."

E say dem break up for 2016 and clear am say im no ever beat her, as im be proper Yoruba man wey dey disciplined.

Tonto Dike na woman of many parts wey pipo claim see as controversial pesin. Apart from say she be actress, Madam Dike also na politician, she get her own NGO foundation wia she take dey help di less privileged and she bin also try her hands for music at a time.

For 2022, she bin emerge as di deputy govnorship candidate of di African Democratic Congress (ADC) for di 2023 general election for Rivers State.

Di govnorship candidate for di state,Tonte Ibraye,binmake di announcement on Friday morning, for im Facebook page.

"Afta series of consultations with leaders of our party, di African Democratic Congress (ADC) for Rivers State and di national level, I happy to announce Ambassador Tonto Dikeh as my running mate for di 2023 gubernatorial election for Rivers State.

"We dey pleased to welcome her to di #RiversRescueMission2023 as we strive to improve di standard of living for evrione in our dear Rivers State."

Tonti Dikeh bin accept di position and say di party dey look forward to invest massively for social protection, to create a social value system for young pipo, increase women inclusion for dia governance system, support small businesses and strengthen traditional institutions, to be active players in di drive to bring sustainable development to di good pipo of Rivers State.

As actress, she don act for many feems, but for 2022, she tell BBC News Pidgin for one interview say she don comot hand kpatakpata for acting feem but she go support di entertainment industry.

She bin also tok for di interview say true-true she dey controversial but na wetin di media don turn her into, ontop question about several times wen she don trend.

But she tok say dem dey misjudge her and di media only delight in reporting di bad tins and dem dey leave out all di beta tins she dey do for communities and di kontri.

"I believe say how you see me, na less of me and more of you, if you get negative opinion about me, I no dey fault you becos we get different opinions." She tok.

Despite controversies wey don surround her marriage and relationships in di past, Tonto tell BBC Pidgin say she go like to marry again but e must be di right pesin.

Olakunle Churchill na Nigerian businessman and philanthropist. E be di founder of Churchill Group and Churchill Foundation.

Churchill Foundation don donate to orphanages, less privileged and don give scholarships to students for Nigeria.

Oga Churchill don receive plenty awards plus accolades. For 2015, e receive one Nigeria Goodwill Ambassador Award.

Na im grandmother raise am for Ondo State. E be di adopted son of former Nigerian president, Olusegun Obasanjo. Oga Churchill marry Rosaline Meurer for 2021 afta e break up wit Tonto Dike for 2016.
title: 'I receive call from my son, King Andre for di first time' - Olakunle Churchill

raw_text:
One of di world popular content creators don attract plenty crowd, mostly im young fans, as im undertake 20-nation tour for Africa, e tok say di continent dey "full of surprises".

Pre-teen boys for Rwanda and Ethiopia cry wit joy and excitement as dem hug dia online hero for real life - wey dem sabi as IShowSpeed or just Speed, wey don get ova 48 million YouTube subscribers. Him dey famous for im high-tempo, frenetic and completely unscripted broadcasts wey fit last from three to 11 hours.

African Americans don dey moved as dem see di love and respect wey dem show to dia countryman, wey go soon turn 21 during im "Speed Does Africa" tour.

For Eswatini, dem give am di name "Logijimako" - wey mean "di one wey dey run" - during di initiation ceremony for royal palace to make am become warrior so e go fit protect di king and im family.

Odas ontop social media don name am "Speedani".

Speed, wey im real name na Darren Watkins Jr, get surprised by di reaction of pipo from Angola - di first country wey im visit - wia one fan recreate di beach meme of Speed "my mom's kinda homeless" face.

"Bro, I no go lie for you," e tell di chat - di fans wey dey watch and comment for im YouTube livestream.

"I love di love for Africa. Di energy here dey crazy."

Ova 28 days, im and im team dey record, dem plan security and logistics. Dem plan visit 20 countries for Africa, including Nigeria, Ivory Coast, Liberia and Ghana.

E dey plan to see di sights, learn some history, explore daily life, culture and food, play sport, perform high-risk stunts, meet fans and lookalikes, meet some ministers of tourism - and generally experience whoever and whatever come im way as he dey speed-walk and livestream.

"I wan show di world wetin Africa really dey like," Speed declare during im South Africa stop - wia e go car-spinning, learn some amapiano dance moves and get scratched by cheetah.

Some pipo don dismiss di tour as superficial gimmick- di stream go only benefit am alone.

In di AskAnAfrican Reddit forum, Bakyumu from Niger describe di tour as 'quick show' by pesin wey be 'entertainer'.

Speed start as gamer, e blow for 2022, bifor e shift go real life and football content.

Im quick rise dey controversial.

Dem don ban am from all Riot Games' online tournaments becos e dey tok sexist tins against female player. E don apologise and admit say e dey wrong.

E also face ban from YouTube for one week becos e dey allow im game character make demengage in inappropriate sexual activity for viewers make dem see.

Speed don build im brand and online persona on ova-di-top, loud, hyper and sometimes aggressive reactions.

E dey do tins like barking, back flips and athletic stunts - like jumping ova moving cars - and im popular saying include 'What the...' and 'Siuuu', wey e dey shout wen e dey celebrate or dey excited for im football hero Cristiano Ronaldo.

GenZs and di younger GenAlpha pipo dey love im raw, uncensored content - wia anytin fit happun live on air.

"I dey enjoy di kind energy wey im get and di tins wey hm dey do," Zambian fan Chinyama Yonga tell BBC.

"Even di funny barks wey im dey do," e dey laugh, di 16-year-old wey brave rainstorm to see Speed for action.

In Zambia, Speed jump inside Devil Pool wey dey near di edge of Mosi-oa-Tunya, or Victoria Falls, come rap wit Zambian hip-hop legend Slapdee.

E also go barbers for township for di capital, Lusaka - and plenty pipo gada dia as di news spread for social media.

"E just dey do like imself - and e dey do different from di normal scripted and professional edited videos," Chinyama tok

One young relative of mine dey craze about Speed and e wan tell me why di YouTuber dey ginger youngsters all over di world.

"E dey funny; e sabi do backflips and e dey really kind. E dey donate money and e dey help pipo wey dey face trouble," Henry Dale wey be 11 years old wey dey school for UK tok.

Darren Jason Watkins Jr wey pipo dey call iShowSpeed, na American internet personality and live streamer.

iShowSpeed wey dem born for Cincinnati, Ohio start to dey create online content since im early teens.

E first focus on gaming videos, livestreaming popular games like NBA 2K and Fortnite but im exaggerated reactions, loud persona and unpredictable behavior make am stand out for di competitive online gaming space.

iShowSpeed get plenti subscribers on YouTube and around 2020 and 2021 im short clips from im livestream blow.

Di viral clips, grow im audience quickly and help am build loyal youthful fanbase wey still dey follow im content closely.

iShowSpeed dey among di most-followed streamers for di world, wit tens of millions subscribers for YouTube and im content dey mixed wit gaming, comedy, music, travel and spontaneous public interactions, usually wit raw, unfiltered energy.

E bin visit Nigeria and oda West-African kontris to meet di local pipo in di kontri and expereince dia daily lives.

During in visit to Lagos, e meet plenty content creators and im presence di city turn into viral moments wey millions of pipo dey watch worldwide.

E meet some local celebrities Peller, Jarvis, Egungun, among oda.

During im meeting wit Egungun wey bin go viral, Egungun ask di streamer im age and compliment im psychique, wey bin go viral

"Speed, how old you be?" and di streamer reply, "I be 21." Egungun tok about im body, "Wow, you dey look healthy and strong." .

raw_text:
Israel foreign minister don arrive for di breakaway state of Somaliland, as e mark di first official visit since Israel bin controversially recognise Somaliland as independent kontri.

Gideon Saar land for di capital city Hargeisa on Tuesday and meet wit Somaliland President Abdirahman Mohamed Abdullahi, according to wetin govment sources for dia tell di BBC.

Last month Israel become di first kontri for di world to recognise Somaliland, wey declare independence from Somalia more dan 30 years ago.

Somaliland president call Israel move "a historic moment", but Somalia reject di development as an attack on dia sovereignty.

Di Israeli foreign ministry neva publicly comment on di foreign minister trip, but one diplomatic source for Somaliland tell di BBC say di intention of di visit na to advance political and strategic partnerships.

Israel decision to recognise Somaliland as an independent nation bin spark condemnation from many oda countries.

Majority of United Nations Security Council members don condemn Israel recognition of Somaliland.

Permanent members of di Council like di United Kingdom and China don reject di move and reaffirm dia support for Somalia sovereignty and territorial integrity.

Di United States na di only Security Council member wey no condemn Israel decision.

DiSomaliland govment confam Saar arrival for one post for X.

Somaliland declare independence from Somalia for 1991, afta di overthrow of Somali military dictator Siad Barre.

Howeva, di region bin remain largely unrecognised for di global stage and Somalia consider Somaliland to be part of dia territory.

Israel recognition of Somaliland last month come as a surprise, wit Israeli President Benjamin Netanyahu citing Somaliland "right to self-determination".

Dis move really spark international condemnation and even call for emergency meeting of di UN Security Council.

China, Turkey and di African Union dey among dose wey criticise Israel step, while di European Union say make dem respect Somalia sovereignty.

Di US defend Israel, say dose wey dey criticising dem get double standards.

For one statement afta Israel announcement, Israel foreign minister Saar say: "Somaliland no be just dis past weekend dem create am. E don exist as functioning state for more dan 34 years.

"Di attacks on Israel recognition of Somaliland dey hypocritical. Only Israel go decide who to recognise and wit who dem fit maintain diplomatic relations."

President Abdullahi say Somaliland go join di Abraham Accords, a deal by di Trump administration for 2020, wey see to how a number of Arab states establish ties wit Israel.

Israel don pledge to cooperate wit Somaliland for agriculture, health, technology and di economy.

Sabi pipo say e get strategic reasons for Israel declaration.

"Israel need allies for di Red Sea region for many strategic reasons, among dem na di possibility of a future campaign against di Houthis," Israeli think tank di Institute for National Security Studies say.
title: Despite all di reactions Israel foreign minister pay historic visit to Somaliland

Confederation of African Football (Caf) don release list of players wey perform best for di 2026 African Cup of Nations (Afcon) for Morocco and enta di best eleven list.

Champions Senegal get four players for di list, runners up Morocco get four players, while Nigeria wey carry third get three players for di list.

Dis na di list of players and dia contributions for di tournament.

Sadio Mane- Di Senegalese top striker bin win player of di tournament for Afcon 2021 and 2025.

E bin score two goals and do 4 assists for Morocco 2025.

Mane lead im team to win di 2025 tournament for Morocco and also lead di team win for di 2021 edition for Cameroon.

E bin don play for teams like Liverpool, Bayern Munich and Southampton bifor e join Saudi Arabian team Al-Nassr wia dey play now.

Brahim Diaz- Di Morocco and Real Madrid striker win highest goal scorer for Afcon 2025.

Di former Manchester City player score 5 goals ahead of odas for di tournament.

E follow team Morocco win second place for di 2025 edition of di tournament.

Afcon 2025 na di 26 years old first eva Afcon tournament.

E win man of dia matches against Comoros and Tanzania.

Im be di first Morocco player to score for all three group stage matches since 1976 and first Morocco player to score for four consecutive Afcon matches.

Diaz miss penalty during di last minutes of di Afcon finals against Senegal. Im team later lose dat match and di trophy to Senegal by 1-0.

Victor Osimhen- Di Nigeria top striker score four goals for di tournament and captain di team for two of dia matches including dia last game wey be di third place match.

Di Galatasaray striker also add two assists for im achievements for di tournament. E win man of di match for dia match against Algeria.

Osimhen don play for two Afcon tournaments in all, 2023 and 2025.

Di Galatasaray mask man bin play for Napoli for Italy bifor e join im current club two years ago.

Yassine Bono- Na di number one goalkeeper of di Morocco national team wey carry second for Afcon 2025 wey im kontri host.

E win best goalkeeper for di tournament. E play five matches for di tournament witout conceding one goal.

E don play for four Afcon tournaments 2019, 2021, 2023 and 2025. E don play for two world cups 2018 and 2025.

Bono bin don play for Girona and Sevilla bifor e join Saudi Arabia side Al Hilal.

Ademola Lookman- Di Atalanta striker give seven goals contribution for Afcon 2025.

E score three goals and do 4 assists for di Super Eagles for di tournament.

Di former African Footballer of di year win man of di match for dia game against Mozambique.

E also collect di man of di tournament award from Sofascore online platform.

Lookman bin don play for Leicester, Fulham and Everton bifor e move to Italy to join Atalanta.

Kelvin Bassy- Di Fulham FC defender na di third Nigeria for di best eleven list.

E perform creditably for dia semi-final and third place matches for im defensive position.

Officially e no win any man of di match award for Afcon 2025 but plenti online fans and im kontri pipo dey award am man of di match online.

Bassey don play for two Afcon tournaments 2023 and 2025.

Pape Gueye- Di Senegalese score di winning goal for di 2025 Afcon tournament for Morocco. E score di goal for extra time afta both teams bin don play draw during full time.

E score two goals for di 2025 Afcon tournament.

E don play for three Afcon tournaments - 2021, 2023 and 2025.

Di midfielder don win Afcon trophy two times - 2021 and 2025.

Gueye bin don play for Marseille, Sevilla and Watford bifor e join Villarreal wia e dey play now.

Noussair Mazraoui- Di 28 years old defender follow Morocco win silver for di 2025 Afcon tournament.

E no score for di tournament but im performance for di Morocco defense line earn am place for di Africa best eleven.

Mazraoui don play two Afcon tournaments - 2023 and 2025.

E follow Morocco play for di 2022 World Cup for Qatar. E help di team become di first African team to reach World Cup semi-final dat year.

Di defender bin don play for Ajax and Bayern Munich bifor e join Manchester United wia e dey play now.

Idrissa Gueye- Idrissa na Senegal defender wey help dem win Afcon 2025 tournament.

Na im captain di team for di finals of Afcon 2025 wey dem win on Sunday.

Gueye dey play for Everton FC for England. E bin don play for Aston Villa and Paris Saint-Germain.

Achraf Hakimi- Hakimi na di reigning African Footballer of di Year.

Although e no score for di tournament, e help im team to win di silver medal.

Hakimi na top defender for Paris Saint-Germain wia e follow di team win di 2025 Champions League.

E follow PSG win Uefa Super Cup 2025 and carry second for Fifa Club World Cup 2025.

E bin don play for Inter Milan and Borussia Dortmund bifor e join PSG.

Nollywood actress and filmmaker, Ini Edo, don beg di feem board, National Film and Video Censors Board (NFVCB) and Christian Association of Nigeria (CAN) make dem no pull down her new feem, 'A Very Dirty Christmas' from di cinema.

Inside one emotional video wey she post for her Instagram page on Sunday night, Ini Edo react to wetin CAN bin say - make NFVB review dia approval of di feem becos of di name, 'A Very Dirty Christmas' wey she use as di title.

On Thursday, President of CAN, Daniel Okoh bin tok say di feem dey offensive and disrespectful to di Christian faith.

Oga Okoh tok say di feem title don turn di spiritual meaning of Christmas and how dem dey celebrate di birth of Jesus Christ into sometin "crude and sensational."

"Di Christian Association of Nigeria dey deeply troubled by di title of di movie: 'A Very Dirty Christmas', wey dem see as offensive and disrespectful to di Christian faith. Christmas na sacred season wey mark di birth of Jesus Christ and represent purity, peace, love and redemption,"e tok.

"Linking such holy celebration wit di word 'dirty' diminish di spiritual meaning and reduce a solemn religious mata into sometin crude and sensational."

While reacting on Sunday night, di actress tok say she no fit do anytin wey go disrespect God or Christendom, she beg make NFVB no pull down her movie as investors don entrust her wit dia money to produce di movie and put am for cinema

"I no fit do anytin wey go disrespect God or Christendom. God house dey feel home, if I be pesin wey no get God I no fit dey here," she tok.

"I don collect money from investors to do dis feem. We don do adverts and promotions. We get 70 cinema house wey don dey show dis feem. How I go come begin change di name and tittle?"

"Abeg, no pull my film, I dey beg. Just allow pipo watch am. Afta una watch finish, make una come back come tok say dis feem dey spoil Christian name or dey make Christianity look bad. If una talk am like dat, I go pull am."

Ini Edo tok say she be pesin wey value religion and she no want any wahala wit CAN or any religious body but make dem allow pipo watch di feem and if di title no good she go change di name herself.

She beg CAN and anyone wey find am disrespectful say she no mean any harm wit di title.

"I be Christian. I no want wahala with Christians at all because I be one of dem. I go change di title, I dey beg make una no pull di feem," she tok.

"If di film no respect God or Christians anyhow, I go remove am and carry di blame.

Dis film no get dirty inside at all. E just dey show family reunion and unfolding secrets."

Di movie 'A very dirty Christmas', wey Ini Edo produce and Akay Mason direct dey show for cinema dis festive period and na about family reunion wey turn emotional wia dem begin reveal old secrets and past trauma.

Di feem feature ogbonge Nollywood stars like  Nancy Isime, IK Ogbonna, Lateef Adedimeji, Josephina Otabor, and Wumi Toriola, among odas.

On Friday, NFVCB Director-General, Shaibu Husseini, issue one press statement on Instagram wia e tok say dem never receive any formal communication from CAN.

Oga Husseini assure di Christian community and di general public say NFVCB hold religious sensitivity, mutual respect, and peaceful co-existence as important mata.

"Di NFVCB clarify say di film get approval and dey classified afta dem don undergo established censorship and classification process, wia di Film Censorship Committee examine di work within di narrative and thematic context," di statement tok.

"Di approval of di title no mean to disrespect Christian faith or di significance of Christmas, but dey considered as part of fictional and creative expression."

NFVCB tok say dem don follow di feem producers tok make dem change di title so e no go offend Christians or cause "religious tension"

Oga Husseini tok say di board go make sure say di films wey dem approve dey inline wit dia laws.

"Di Board dey assure di public say dem go follow di National Film and Video Censors Board Act, including Section 39(1), wey give di Film Censorship Committee power to withdraw film from exhibition for further review wia such action dey considered necessary in di interest of di public," NFVB tok.

Leader of Economic Freedom Fighters [EFF] Party for South Africa, Julius Malema dey appear for East London magistrate court ahead of di judgement wey go happun on Friday 23 January, 2026.

Court bin convict am sake of say e violate di Firearms Control Act last October.

Di court find am guilty of unlawful possession of firearm and ammunition, discharging of firearm for area wey plenti pipo dey and reckless endangerment.

Malema bin fire rifle for air during one EFF rally wey bin happun for Mdantsane for 2018.

Di crowds bin dey cheer am dat time, and im supporters don showface to support am for court.

Di South African opposition politician fit get upto a minimum sentence of 15 years for prison.

For 2018, one video bin show how di Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) leader bin use one semi-automatic rifle to fire several shots in di air during di fifth anniversary celebrations of im party wey bin happun for di Eastern Cape province for South Africa.

Dem bin charge am with im former bodyguard Adriaan Snyman, wey don dey acquitted.

Court bin also convict Malema of hate speech sake of say e dey always tok about di white minority for di kontri 31 years afta di apartheid end, racial tensions still dey high.

E chop accuse say e fire between 14 and 15 live rounds on top stage in front of 20,000 EFF supporters, according to South African news site SowetanLIVE.

For im defence earlier,  Malema tell di court say no be im get di gun wey im bin use fire di shots to ginger di crowd, di publication add.

E take three days for magistrate Twanet Olivier to tell Malema "you dey found guilty as charged".

Di magistrate bin adjourn di case to January 2026 for pre-sentencing.

Malema prosecution bin come afta di Afrikaner lobby group AfriForum, one group wey get gbege wit Malema and di EFF, open case against am afta di video bin go viral.

AfriForum bin also dey among di pipo wey file hate speech complaint against di EFF MP for South Africa Human Rights Commission.

Dis one make South Africa equality court find am guilty for August dis year.

Na afta one incident wia one white man allegedly assault one EFF member, Malema say: "No white man go beat me up... make you no fear to kill. Revolution demand say at some point, killing must happun."

Di equality court bin rule say dis comments "demonstrate intent to incite harm", but di EFF, say dem take dem out of context.

Malema controversy go beyond South Africa.

US President Donald Trump bin show one video of di radical leader during im heated meeting wit South African President Cyril Ramaphosa for di White House for May.

Oga Trump bin use am as part of im "evidence" say di kontri dey commit genocide against white Afrikaners for South Africa - one claim wey many pipo no accept.

One month later, dem deny Malema entry to di UK sake of im support for Hamas and comments about white pipo for South Africa.

Di Home Office tok say dem see am as "non-conducive to di public good".
title: Malema return to court for pre-sentencing sake of firearm case

Di death of Princess Allwell Eniobanke Ademola, one popular Nigerian actress and feem producer don throw di Nollywood industry into mourning.

On Saturday evening, tori break say di 49-year-old actress don pass on, and di report leave her colleagues and fans in rude shock.

Di family of Princess Allwell Ademola wey announce her death, say dem go communicate details of her burial in due course.

For one statement, wey Adegboyega Adebayo sign on behalf of her family to announce her passing, say she die on Saturday, 27 December at di age of 49.

"Wit heavy hearts and total submission to di will of God, we announce di passing of our beloved sister, mother and aunt Princess Allwell Ademola wey comot dis world on Saturday, 27th of December at di age of 49," di statement read.

Di cause of her death no dey known, but tori wey dey spread wey BBC neva fit confam be say she suffer heart attack.

Tributes don dey pour in for di actress wey enta limelight for her role for one 2018 movie "Ile Wa".

President of Theatre Arts and Movie Practitioners Association of Nigeria (Tampan) Bolaji Amusan wey pipo sabi as Mr Latin also confam di tori of her death for one post on im official Instagram account.

"My heart dey heavy tonight. We don lost @allwellademola - a brilliant producer, director, and musician wey im passion, creativity, and spirit don leave deep mark on evrione wey sabi her. You come, you create, you inspire. Rest in perfect peace, Allwell. You no go eva dey forgotten," Oga Latin post read.

Her cousin wey also be feem actor and producer Muyiwa Ademola also confam her death wit heart-breaking emojis. "Na one of di saddest news I don eva get!" e tok as e wish her goodnight.

Her death come few hours afta she post one video on her Instagram account wey she take declare wit song say, 'I go see di end of dis year, dis year no go eva see my end".

Plenti of her colleagues and fans don enta social media to pen dia tributes to di actress wey many of dem describe as pesin wey dey calm, passionate about her work and industrious.

For many, tori of her death still be like dream, as dem say she dey healthy, she no sick and she bin jolly wit some of dem during Christmas.

Ogbonge actors like Femi Adebayo, Dayo Amusa, Iyabo Ojo and many odas express dia sadness, pain and shock to di loss.

Princess Allwell Eniobanke Ademola na ogonge actress, movie producer and singer, but she like make pipo dey address her as entertainer.

According to her bio for her Instagram account, she add say she be brand influencer and CEO of Allwell&Co band.

Dem born her for 1976 into one royal family for Abeokuta, Ogun State, southwest Nigeria. She be di great grand daughter of di Alake of Egba land.

For one interview wit Tribune Newspaper, late Ms Ademola say she begin dey act feems wen she dey small, but her father no support her acting, so she stop am and start to sing wey her father support. Along di line, she enta stage productions becos of school and she start to dey do stage productions. However, she join Nollywood proper for 1992 and don act and produce plenti ogonge feems wey include Omo Emi, You or I, among odas.

Ademola also na talented singer and form her own band, "Allwell and Company," for 2002. She release one album for 2006.

She don win several awards, wey include Best Supporting Actress for di 2016 Best of Nollywood Awards for her role for "Hakunde".

Ms Ademola bin dey engaged and dey plan her wedding, but her fiancé die two months bifor dia wedding, and she remain single since den. For one interview wey she do, she say she bin dey follow her fiancé tok for phone, wia she hear di gunshot wey kill am. She say di tin shake her for years and make her depressed.
title: Nollywood mourn actress Princess Allwell Ademola wey die at 49

6 mins - Almost 1-0 as Senegal corner kick alost enta as Moroccan keeper Yassine Bounou first miss am bifor im adjust block ball wit chest

8 mins - na Senegal dey push pass for dis time as Nicolas Jackson push, Noussair Mazraoui bounce am comot.

10 mins - Moroccan Abde Ezzalzouli see im chance dey blocked my Malik Diouf.

12 mins - Morocco don get goal kick.

14 mins - Morocco don dey do doinds as Ismael Saibari move from midfield as gap open for am at edge of bo only for am to use left leg kick am troway.

16 mins - Iliman Ndiaye  dribble Nicolas Jackson only for Antoine  Mendy do beta defending work for dia to make am goal kick

20 mins - All Senegal attacks dey pass through Sadio Mane. E don enta midfield to try make sometin happun.

22 mins - Morocco find opening and Ismael Saibari enta one on one until e give di ball to di keeper but e dey wide. Howeva e still dey offside sha.

24 mins -Lamine Camara don gbab di first yellow card of di game afta e dive for di halfway line and enta Neil El Aynaoui.

27 mins - Nicolas Jackson don clear di ball and Sadio Mane don win wide free kick.

28 mins - Lamine Camara go want that free kick back. E smash im cross ova evribodi and go for goal kick.

30 mins - Yassine Bounbou do beta keeping as im head ball wey bin wan go Sadio Mane

34 mins - Morocco no fit use di wide free kick do beta tin and ball don go back to Senegal. Malick Diouf dribble two players to enta midfield.

38 mins - Ahhhh beta save!!!! Nicolas Jackson bin get ogbonge ball give Iliman Ndiayee wey enta one on one wit keeper.

But e no make am as keeper Yassine Bounou quick comot im line and manage comot di ball wit kick.

41 mins - Morocco almost open scoring afta Ismael Saibari spin from defender and sama ogbonge ball. Even though Morocco defender Nayef Aguerd dey free for middle.

45 mins - Four minutes dey added to di end of di first half! Senegal move forward till dem tackle Sadio Mane for di box. Senegal don get corner

45+2 mins - Morocco head Senegal corner comot.

45+2 mins - Morocco don lose possession for dangerous area, all Lamine Camara suppose do na play in Sadio Mane but guy shoot am nad dem block am. Chai!!!

45+4 mins - HALF TIME DON REACH!!!

From di team side dem don least di 11 players wey go play for id AFCOn trophy

For Senegal na: Edouard Mendy, Antoine Mendy, Niakhate, El Hadji Malick Diouf, Camara, Idrissa Gueye, Iliman Nadiaye, Pape Gueye, Jackson, Mane

For Morocco na: Bounou, Hakimi, Aguerd, Masina, Mazraoui, Ezzalzouli, El Aynaoui, Saibari, El Khannouss, El Kaabi, Diaz

Dis no go be di first big moment for di Morocco team wey dey headed by Walid Regragui in recent years.

Dis na becos Morooco becom di first kontri from Africa wey go reach World Cup semi-finals wey dem do for 2022.

Dem also jump enta 11 for di world rankings even pass Italy sef.

But dis neva change anytin for dia track record for di African stage as dia only Afcon tilte dem win am for 1976.

In fact dis na di first time wey dem even smell di finals since 2004 wey Ragragui still dey play for di team sef, but dem still loose to Tunisia
title: Senegal beat Morocco to win Afcon 2025 afta last minute drama

raw_text:
Di new Nigeria tax law go take effect from January 2026, and di govment say nothing go make dem stop am.

Nigeria govment under President Bola Tinubu  bin setup diPresidential Fiscal Policy and Tax Reforms Committee.

Di work of di committee na to bring togeda multiple taxes and levies at all levels of govment so e go easy.

Part of di work of di tax committee na also to comot tax provisions wey dey serve as problems to business and economic growth.

Nigeria President Tinubu appoint ogbonge tax expert, Taiwo Oyedele, as di committee chairman for July 2023, and by August 2023, dem inaugurate di committee.

Years afta di constitution of dat committee, dem begin look into Nigeria tax system and di revenue collection method.

Na from dia dem draft di new tax law and by November 2025, oga Tinubu bin approve di establishment of di National Tax Policy Implementation Committee (NTPIC).

Howeva, plenti tok don come ontop dis tax mata as pipo dey debate if e go reduce dia burden or e go add to am.

For di statement on 30 December 2025, President Tinubu say no major issue dey for dem to stop di reform process and say make Nigerians trust di process as di reform dey begin.

BBC News Pidgin sidon wit oga Taiwo Oyedele wey dey head di tax reform committee to ansa some key questions wey dey worry Nigerians.

Oga Oyedele say di new tax law na to ease di burden of tax ontop Nigerians.

E say any Nigerian wey dey earn income gatz tell govment if di money wey dey enta dia account na dia own, loan or na anoda pesin get am.

"But if plenti money dey your account and you no tell govment wetin e be, weda na income or no be income, govment fit come to you and say we dey see dis kain money for your account, we tink say na income wey you suppose pay tax."

Oga Oyedele confam say govment get access to information inside your bank accounts.

E add say di new tax law go allow make pipo fit pay for food and oda basic consumption wey dem need evriday.

"Poor pipo wey dey pay tax, di tax dey too much, so dis reform na to take away di burden of tax, so dem go get space to breathe."

"Dem go be able to pay for food, rent, education, accommodation and transportation. Di tax wey dey for all dis basic consumption, we don remove am."

Oga Oyedele say pipo wey no dey make money or dey make small money, dem go dey exempt from di new tax law.

Also, e tok on pipo wey dey dodge tax wey dem suppose pay.

"Inside Nigeria, plenti pipo wey suppose dey pay money dey dodge tax wey be say dem no go even pay anytin, weda dem dey make billions of naira, dem no dey pay, and govment dey allow dem to get away wit not paying."

"Under dis new law, dat no go hapun again. So wen you make pipo wey dey dodge tax to pay di tax, make rich people pay a little bit more, govmemt money go come."

You fit find more details ofwho go pay tax and who no go pay for here.

Oga Oyedele during di interview say Nigeria don introduce di progressive tax system wey be say na di rich go dey pay more tax becos dem earn more

E say for di progressive tax system "pesin wey poor no suppose pay tax, pesin wey dey middle class suppose pay small and pesin wey be upper class dey make plenti of money and suppose to pay more."

"So di money wey govment go collect to run di economy go come from pipo wey dey make plenti of money."

"From 2026, di reform be say you go pay less tax if you be low income earner, you go pay low tax if you be middle class you go pay less tax, but if you be rich pesin, you suppose pay a lit bit more."

Plenti Nigerians home and abroad dey confused weda if dia family members wey dey outside di kontri send dem money, dem go comot tax.

"If pesin send money from abroad give you, no tax. If pesin give you gifts weda from inside or outside Nigeria, no tax."

"So long as e no be your income for di service wey you render or maybe you just sell something. Like if you dey sell cars, or you dey sell phones, na dat one dey taxable."

E get anoda tori say Nigeria don partner wit different countries so dem go fit track pipo wey dey work for dem for Nigeria.

Oga Oyedele confam am say na true, say Nigeria don signup for dat intelligence say pipo no go fit dey hide dia income from govment again.

"Nigeria no be di only kontri, more dan 100 kontris all ova di world, dem don agree, dem call am common reporting standard"

"If I see anytin wey your citizens dey do for my kontri I go tell you, you too if you see anytin wey my citizens dey do for your kontri, you go tell me back."

"Na im be say if you dey do sometin online, you dey make cool money wey no bad, but you dey hide am from govment, govmemt go fit find out from dose intelligence from oda kontris.

Oga Oyedele say make pipo dey honest for dia income becos if govment later find out your income and you no dey pay tax, e go come wit penalty and interest.

Oga Oyedele say na lie say dem godebit money from bank accounts wey get tax IDand Tax Identification Number (TIN). E call am fake news.

"Anoda fake news be say pipo tok say from next year January, dem go take money from your account becos you get tax ID and TIN, dem go debit your account.

"If you get bank account and you dey use am for business, you suppose get TIN, e no mean say dem go tax you, e just mean say govment dey interested  for wetin you dey do, in case you dey make plenti of money, you suppose pay tax."

According to Oyedele, e say di new tax reform no go cause inflation like many pipo dey tok.

"From 2026, dis reform go reduce di price of food weda you dey buy bread or weda you dey buy garri, or yam, price go come down."

Ontop VAT mata, e say dem don comot am from basic consumption items wey Nigerians dey use.

"If you dey do health, pharmaceutical, you dey buy paracetamol or oda stuff like dat, price too go come down."

"Same tin for rent, e no carry VAT anymore, transportation no carry VAT."

Story by Adesola Ikulajolu and Mobolaji Olatunde
title: New tax laws: Four tins to know about di reforms wey go take effect from January 2026
